name: Flipping Birds - Slide Flip N' Glide
name_original: Flipping Birds - Slide Flip N' Glide
description:
Take flight with the Flipping Birds in this Fast Action strategy game. The birds lost their wings but they can still flip and glide their way across a colorful world. Beware of the shooting enemies trying to stop you. See how far you can get. Collect coins and gems on your adventure.

>Choose between 3 characters
>Simple Tap and Hold Gameplay
>GameCenter enabled
>Kids Mode available
